title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, available on PyPI inside langchain-community.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper around Ollama with extra utilities and TUI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying and extending Ollama (Kubernetes, GPU, etc.).

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for installing Ollama declaratively on NixOS.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that lets you query Ollama models from within the editor.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger pipeline example that spins up Ollama in a container for CI-based LLM tasks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for building RAG apps with Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with slash commands and streaming replies.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama published to Hex.pm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.
